name: Cleaning Chaos
description:
PLAY THE GAME: Here

Hello everyone! This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1! If you do not know what a game jam is, it's a competition where you. have to make a game based on a certain theme and/or restriction in a limited period of time. (not official definition)

Anyways, all the instructions are in-game. If you have an itch.io account, rate the game Here

It is very appreciated :).

All the art and programming was made by me. SFX and Music were provided by scratch (the game engine I used to make this entry). 

Have fun!
